column2: we went on a Saturday night around 8:30 pm with no reservation. So
column4: but I really appreciated being able to place our order when we got there so it could start cooking while we waited for our table. We did wait
column6: and it was super busy while we were eating
column7: but the manager KATIE WENT WAY ABOVE AND BEYOND to make sure we were happy and satisfied
column8: and she was an all-around pleasure to speak with as well.
